title: tough Script font to identify, only 1 letter available 'h'
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415002313im_/http:/typophile.com/files/h_4250.jpg)

Whatthefont could not find it and I could not find any alternatives that fit as well as this one. Any tips?

Thanks.
author: CristianM

comments.content:
This chunky script letter seems fairly well matched by Nihlah, although it is a little heavier.  
Some others to consider Arbor Brush, Logotype Frenzy, Deadhead Script, Globe Script, Letistra, Suzee FY, Yeah Script, Filmotype Horizon.  
Don
Could be [Rukola](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415002313/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nikola-giacintova/rukola) but very hard to be positive with one letter only...
